Uses of Package
com.mygdx.game.ui

  • Packages that use com.mygdx.game.ui 
    Package Description
    com.mygdx.game
    Contains core classes for the game.
    com.mygdx.game.battle
    Contains classes relating to the battle system.
    com.mygdx.game.entity
    Contains classes relating to characters in the game overworld.
    com.mygdx.game.ui
    Contains classes relating to the in-game user interface.
  • Classes in com.mygdx.game.ui used by com.mygdx.game 
    Class and Description
    UIManager
    Manages UI components.
    UIRenderer
    Responsible for rendering each UI component.
    UIShop
    Represents the shop where the player can buy/sell items.
  • Classes in com.mygdx.game.ui used by com.mygdx.game.battle 
    Class and Description
    UIBattleSkillItemMenu
    Represents a menu of either skills or items selectable in battle.
    UIBattleStatus
    Represents the party's status display during battle.
    UIDialogue
    Represents a sequence of dialog boxes.
    UIManager
    Manages UI components.
    UIMessageBox
    Represents a message box with simple text.
    UIRenderer
    Responsible for rendering each UI component.
  • Classes in com.mygdx.game.ui used by com.mygdx.game.entity 
    Class and Description
    UIManager
    Manages UI components.
  • Classes in com.mygdx.game.ui used by com.mygdx.game.ui 
    Class and Description
    UIComponent
    Base class for all UI components.
    UIConsumableMenu
    Represents the list of consumable items in the overworld.
    UIConsumableMenu.Item
    Represents an item in the UIConsumableMenu.
    UIDialogue
    Represents a sequence of dialog boxes.
    UIDialogue.UIDialogueBox
    Represents a single message in the UIDialogue.
    UIEquipmentMenu
    Represents the list of equipment items (including equipped ones) in the overworld.
    UIEquipmentMenu.Item
    Represents an item of equipment in the UIEquipmentMenu.
    UIManager
    Manages UI components.
    UIMessageBox
    Represents a message box with simple text.
    UIPartyMenu
    Represents the party menu in the overworld.
    UIPlayer
    Represents a player in the party menu.
    UIShop
    Represents the shop where the player can buy/sell items.
    UIShop.ShopItem
    Represents an item listed in the shop.
